nodes.text: Pursuit among the Ruins! was the fifth instalment of The Keeper's World, published in Pizzazz 5 in February 1978. The entire story arc was reprinted in the UK in Star Wars Weekly 47–50 in 1978–79, and in the 1999 limited-release comic Star Wars 0.

An Imperial Commander and a complement of Stormtroopers land on Keeper's World and pursue Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, C-3PO, and R2-D2, who have been stranded after a crash landing. The droids cannot outrun the Stormtroopers, so Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, and the droids take cover in the ruins of a temple. Just as they are cornered, C-3PO accidentally activates a device that causes them to vanish, not knowing where they might reappear.
